nodes.text: An clone Advanced Recon Commando commander participated in the Battle of Aridka during the Clone Wars. Protecting a city from the Confederacy of Independent Systems, the commander's force consisted of only a handful of clone troopers and another ARC trooper. When the clones' defense field was obliterated, the clones made their last stand, but received last minute support from Jedi Master Plo Koon. With the commander's help, Koon destroyed several droid tanks, and ultimately won the battle. Koon left the clones shortly after their victory.
